1.name: Protect
1.description: This move enables the user to protect itself from all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

2.name: Waterfall Model
2.description: The opponent is hit with falling water.

3.name: Kernel
3.description: A kernel is hurled at the opponent.

4.name: Firewall
4.description: A small wall of fire hurts the opponent.
